Name: Business Support Standard
PriceDescription: Price per month per host (minimum 10 hosts)
Description:
Business Support Standard:

* 7am â€“ 6pm business days, local time.
* 4 Hour response for issues, 4 named support contacts.

Our support provides you with an easy way to interact directly with the our development team; whether you have an issue with the product, think you have found a bug, or need help on how to use CecOS CaaS, we are here to help. Support is initiated from our web based ticketing system, and support is provided either by Slack messaging, Zoom remote support, or email.

Price is per Docker Host, with a 10 Host minimum, and is an annual support subscription.

Name: Business Support Critical
PriceDescription: Price per month per host (minimum 10 hosts)
Description:
Business Support Critical:

* 24x7
* 1 Hour response for issues, 4 named support contacts.

Our support provides you with advanced support for critical requirements. Business Support Critical is an easy way to interact directly with the our development team; whether you have an issue with the product, think you have found a bug, or need help on how to use CecOS CaaS, we are here to help. Support is initiated from our web based ticketing system, and support is provided either by Slack messaging, Zoom remote support, or email.

Price is per Docker Host, with a 10 Host minimum, and is an annual support subscription.
